errors.cannotLoadChecklist: Ye can't load the data checklist, matey
errors.cannotLoadSheet: Map could not be found, Arrr!
errors.noWorkbooksDescription: Data checklist be needin' at least 1 logbook to be active. Please have yer developer check the configuration. If this problem persists, please contact support, matey.

query.description: Summon the AI to craft a scroll for ye in FFQL, matey

errorBanner.generalError: Arrr! Something be amiss. Try yer luck again.

query.instruction: Tell the AI matey how ye'd like it to decipher yer data:

review.description: Here's what I've brewed up. Read the step-by-step tale and the scroll, and if it be lookin' seaworthy, click below to make it so.

transform.description: Summon AI to work its magic on yer treasure trove of data

errorBanner.generalError: Avast! Something's gone awry. Try yer luck again, ye scallywag.
errorBanner.versionError: No way to turn back time, matey! The AI's magic be halted. Try again if ye dare.

transform.instruction: Tell the AI matey how ye'd like it to transform yer booty of data:

review.description: Here's what I've conjured. Read the step-by-step spell and the incantation, and if it be lookin' safe, click below to unleash the magic.
review.warning: Warning: This spell will alter yer data

transforming.inProgress: Unleashing the magic on yer treasure

error.description: Arrr! This scroll doesn't seem to exist in Davy Jones' locker
error.title: Scroll not found

errors.fileNotFound: Arrr! Can't find the treasure map
errors.missingParameter: Ye forgot to provide a piece of the puzzle
errors.refreshPageDescription: Hoist the sails and refresh the page. If the problem lingers, send a message to the crew.
errors.spaceNotFound: There be no space to be found
errors.unauthorized: Yer access be denied, ye scallywag
errors.workbookNotFound: No sign of the workbook here, matey

deleteModal.downloadDescription_one: This plundered treasure be walkin' the plank from the space.
deleteModal.downloadDescription_other: These plundered treasures be walkin' the plank from the space.
deleteModal.uploadsDescription_one: All data imported will be stashed. This will make the treasure disappear from the space.
deleteModal.uploadsDescription_other: All data imported will be stashed. This will make the treasures disappear from the space.

uploads.description: Drag and drop or deliver a treasure to get started
uploads.heading: Add treasures

errors.uploadDisabledDescription: If ye be thinkin' this be an error, please talk to support.
errors.uploadDisabledHeading: This space doesn't have the wind for treasure deliveries.

popovers.uploadsDisabled: This space doesn't have the wind for treasure deliveries.

tooltips.cannotImport: Deliverin' to a workbook be not available for this treasure
tooltips.noExtension: This treasure be lackin' an inscription. Add the right inscription to the treasure name and deliver it again to put it in a workbook.

getNewAccessLink.content: We've fired a secure access cannonball to
getNewAccessLink.finePrint: If ye be havin' trouble findin' the message, take a look in yer spam chest or reload this map to fire another access cannonball. The cannonball be good for 5 minutes.
getNewAccessLink.heading: Check yer treasure chest

panel.empty: Adventures will appear here when they're sailing or completed

mapping.failed: Failed to chart to treasure map

dropdownOptions.keepAsIsDisabledTooltip: Adding a new option to this booty list be not supported. Importing a value that be not a valid option will show as an error.

incomingFields.heading: Incoming Booty
incomingFields.noDataTooltip: Ye can select a valid booty option to fill all empty chests. Ye can also leave this empty.

mapEnums.subheading: These chests have treasures that must be plundered and mapped to a list of valid options.
mapEnums.title: Map Booty

addNewField.description: Add this booty to your ship

mapFields.subheading: Review and confirm each plundering choice

sheetSelection.importToHeading: Select a treasure chest to import this treasure to
sheetSelection.title: Import to...

emptyView.heading: Avast ye!

noSheets.description: A treasure chest must contain at least one map. None were found.
noSheets.title: Treasure chest contains no maps

errors.cellUpdateFailed: Something went wrong. Please refresh the ship and try again. If this continues, please reach out to support
errors.invalidFFQL: Arrr! Please check your pirate code

enum.loadingError: Blasted storms! Can't load the booty!

messages.reference: The treasure ain't in our maps, matey

modal.descriptionExactOnly: Replace all the text in this column with a true treasure. We be lookin' only for exact matches
modal.descriptionPartialAndExact: Swap out all the text in this column. We be supportin' both partial and exact matches in this quest for riches

errors.findError: Davy Jones' locker holds the error
errors.generalError: Arrr, somethin' be amiss. Try again, matey

modal.exactMatchesOnly: Only true treasures will be revealed
modal.finding: Scourin' the seas for all instances
modal.heading: Hunt and replace in {{columnName}}
modal.isFiltered: This treasure map be filtered. Hunt and replace will run only on the filtered records.

description.addValues: This be fillin' all the empty treasure chests in {{columnName}}
description.addValuesToAll: All the treasure chests in {{columnName}} be empty; you can load 'em with a chosen treasure
description.addValuesToCount_one: There be {{formattedCount}} empty treasure chest in {{columnName}}. Load it with a chosen treasure
description.addValuesToCount_other: There be {{formattedCount}} empty treasure chests in {{columnName}}. Load 'em with a chosen treasure
description.noEmptyValues: No empty treasure chests found here!

heading.addValues: Add a treasure to empty chests in {{columnName}}
heading.addValuesToAll: Add a treasure to all empty chests in {{columnName}}
heading.addValuesToCount_one: Add a treasure to {{formattedCount}} empty treasure chest in {{columnName}}
heading.addValuesToCount_other: Add a treasure to {{formattedCount}} empty treasure chests in {{columnName}}
heading.noEmptyValues: No empty treasure chests found here!

replaceEnum.moreOptions: Showin' the first 100 treasures. Search to uncover more

replaceValue.leavingBlank: Leavin' this field blank be sendin' the treasure to Davy Jones' locker

modal.searchForEmpty: If ye leave this field empty, we'll be searchin' for hidden treasures

tooltip.maxPinned: Ye can only nail down three columns; loose one of the anchored columns to nail this one
tooltip.pin: Nail this column to the left side of the map
tooltip.unpin: Click to loose the anchor on this column

modal.cancelButton: Nay, I give up the search

errors.description: This treasure map be havin' trouble displayin' the riches. Look to the stars for error details.
errors.title: Somethin' be amiss

tooltip.createRow: Add a treasure to create this row
tooltip.noData: There be no rows available to choose. Only rows with riches can be selected.

copyAlert.description: We see ye tryin' to plunder more than 100 records. We be limitin' the loot to 100 records to keep our treasure safe.
copyAlert.download: Would ye like to download this map as a .csv?
copyAlert.heading: Ye want to take this treasure map with ye?

deleteAlert.descriptionEnd: The records ye see inside this application may not be in the exact same order as yer source. This application modifies the riches to remove empty records, duplicates, and more. We don't be advisin' deletin' more than 100 records at a time.
deleteAlert.descriptionStart: We see ye tryin' to send more than 100 records to Davy Jones' locker. We be limitin' the deletions to 100 records at a time to keep the riches intact.
deleteAlert.heading: Ye be reachin' our deletion limit!

pasteAlert.descriptionEnd: The records ye see inside this application may not be in the exact same order as yer source. This application modifies the riches to remove empty records, duplicates, and more. We don't be advisin' pastin' more than 100 records at a time.
pasteAlert.descriptionStart: We see ye tryin' to paste more than 100 records. We be limitin' the pastin' to 100 records to keep the riches intact.
pasteAlert.heading: Ye be reachin' our pastin' limit!

tooltip.active: Send the scallywags to Davy Jones' locker

disabled.deleteDisabled: Ye can't be sendin' the crew to the locker in this Scroll.
disabled.noRecordsSelected: Pick at least one scallywag to send to Davy Jones' locker

disabledTooltip.requireAllValid: This action be needin' all picked rows to be blessed
disabledTooltip.requireSelection: Please select one or more scallywags to use this action

tooltip.filtered: This treasure map be filtered to show {{filteredCount}} of the {{countString}} {{filter}} records.
tooltip.filteredByError: This treasure map be filtered via the curse filter to show {{filteredCount}} of the {{countString}} {{filter}} records.
tooltip.filteredByFFQL: This treasure map be filtered via the Flatfile Pirate Code to show {{filteredCount}} of the {{countString}} {{filter}} records.
tooltip.filteredBySearch: This treasure map be filtered via a treasure hunt to show {{filteredCount}} of the {{countString}} {{filter}} records.
tooltip.filteredBySearchAndError: This treasure map be filtered via a treasure hunt and the curse filter to show {{filteredCount}} of the {{countString}} {{filter}} records.

default.description: Arrr! An unexpected squall be causin' trouble - no matchin' action to be applied.

confirm.description: Ye be sure ye want to send this version to Davy Jones' locker?
confirm.heading: Ye be wantin' to delete this version?

error.description: This version be too stubborn to be deleted - an unexpected error be blockin' the way. If the problem be stickin' around, contact support for help.
error.heading: No way to send this version to the locker

success.description: This version be gone to Davy Jones' locker. It be swimmin' with the fishes now.
success.heading: Version sent to Davy Jones' locker

confirm.description: Ye be about to bring yer sheet data back from the depths of Davy Jones' locker. Be ye sure ye want to sail this treacherous sea?
confirm.heading: Confirm bringin' back a version from the depths

success.description: Yer sheet has been successfully rescued from the locker! Send word to yer mates in the sheet to refresh their browsers and avoid any cursed troubles.
success.heading: Successful rescue from the locker

panel.empty: Versions, once discovered, will appear here. Versions be discovered on their own, usually when a grand transformation of data takes place.
panel.generatedSnapshot: Snapshot created afore unleashing AI magic for prompt:
panel.heading: History of Versions
panel.versionRestored: Version created afore rescuin' from the depths of a previous version
